me.Abhigya.core.util.bossbar.version.oldest

Class BossBarOldest

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.Abhigya.core.util.bossbar.BossBar
      • me.Abhigya.core.util.bossbar.base.BossBarBase
        • me.Abhigya.core.util.bossbar.version.oldest.BossBarOldest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Listener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BossBar, BossBar, BossBar

    public abstract class BossBarOldest
extends BossBarBase
implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
    Base class for BossBars for server versions <= Version.v1_8_R3.
